Discover the nominees and laureates of the 2016 Convergences Awards!

The 2016 Convergences Awards have two main categories:

  • The European Award which rewards a project whose beneficiaries are mostly based within the European Union.
  • The International Award which rewards a project whose beneficiaries are mostly based outside the European Union.

In 2016, the jury had the possibility to reward a Special “Sustainable cities and territories” Award for a project specifically innovative and relevant in addressing development of sustainable cities and territories.
